content.rendered:
We expect you to;

  • Have extensive knowledge of HTML5 and CSS3;
  • Have experience in JavaScript/JQuery;
  • Have experience in working with PHP;
  • Have experience in working with frameworks (Laravel);
  • Good knowledge of relational databases (MYSQL);
  • Have experience with WordPress/ Magento – would be a plus;
  • Be able to manage multiple tasks and prioritise work;
  • Have the ability to work collaboratively as part of a project team;
  • Have excellent English skills.

Your main responsibilities include;

  • Collaborate with business analysts and developers to produce software designs;
  • Transform software designs and specifications into high functioning code in the appropriate language;
  • Integrate individual software solutions to higher level systems;
  • Cooperate with web designers to match visual design intent;
  • Edit content and re-design web pages;
  • Test code periodically to ensure it produces the desirable results and perform debugging when necessary
  • Maintain and expand our websites;
  • Assist and support in the upkeeping of our websites.
  • Perform upgrades to make software and systems more secure and efficient.
